posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!

Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Welcome to Vintage at Lakewood a luxury 55+ apartment community located in beautiful Marysville, Washington.
Currently offering spacious 1 and 2 bedroom apartment homes featuring modern appliances including a full-size washer and dryer, microwave, twelve place setting dishwasher and more.

Vintage at Lakewood offers a hassle free lifestyle with resort-style amenities including a state of the art fitness center, spacious clubhouse with refreshment lounge, huge clubhouse and our premier movie theater.
Vintage at Lakewood apartments offers the very best hassle-free, luxury living lifestyle for the 55+ community.
Our scenic location, state of the art amenities, spacious homes and pet friendly environment make us the perfect choice for your new home.
Additinal $300 deposit and $25 monthly pet fee per pet.
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven
